description: Numbers n such that 21*2^n-1 is prime.
references: H. Riesel, Lucasian criteria for the primality of N=h.2^n-1, Math. Comp., 23 (1969), 869-875.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Ray Ballinger and Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n + 1 for k < 300
Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n - 1 for k < 300
Index entries for sequences of n such that k*2^n-1 (or k*2^n+1) is prime
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 02 2008
